content: You can find Captain Void-Illusion along the Road of Longevity in the Valley of Ecstasy. From the Shrine, head directly right and up the small hill past a large inacessible tower. You'll find a large corpse of some kind at the base of a statue built into the cliffs ahead.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Void-Illusion.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Void-Illusion', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Void-Illusion'.
The content is as follows:
You can find Captain Void-Illusion along the Road of Longevity in the Valley of Ecstasy. From the Shrine, head directly right and up the small hill past a large inacessible tower. You'll find a large corpse of some kind at the base of a statue built into the cliffs ahead.
